sentences: The sub-group on response measures, facilitated by Richard Muyungi, considered Annex III.F of document FCCC/AWGLCA/2009/14 .
Parties exchanged views on draft conclusions on response measures and reduced options on other topics including trade and whether a forum is needed.

Parties could not agree on the appropriate approach for exchanging information, with many developing countries preferring a permanent forum and developed countries expressing concern with language on institutional structure.
Some developed countries also suggested a reference to a focus on vulnerable and least developed countries.
